text: Yakhana tara musalamanadera sathe milita haya, takhana baleh amara musalamana hayechi. Ara yakhana parasparera sathe nibhrte abasthana kare, takhana bale, palanakarta tomadera jan'ye ya prakasa karechena, ta ki tadera kache bale diccha? Tahale ye tara e niye palakartara samane tomaderake mithya pratipanna karabe. Tomara ki ta upalabdhi kara na
